column1: The S&P CNX Nifty closed at 4332.95 points on July 31, 2008 representing a increase of 292.40 pts points (7.24%), as compared to 4040.55 points on June 30, 2008 . During the month of July 2008, S&P CNX Nifty touched a high of 4539.45 points on July 24, 2008 before closing at 4332.95 points on July 31, 2008. The market capitalisation of  S&P CNX Nifty increased from Rs.2434104 crores on June 30, 2008 to Rs.2617902 crores on July 31, 2008, i.e. a increase of Rs.183798 crores (7.55%)
* Beta & R2 are calculated for the period 01-Aug-2007 to 31-July-2008
* Beta measures the  degree to which any portfolio of stocks is affected as compared to the effect
on the market as a whole.
* The coefficient of determination (R2) measures the strength of relationship between two variables
the return on  a security versus that of the market.
* Volatility is the Std. deviation of the daily returns for the period 01-July-2008 to 31-July-2008
* Impact Cost for S&P CNX Nifty is for a portfolio of Rs. 50 Lakhs
* Impact Cost for S&P CNX Nifty is the weightage average impact cost
